title: Product Features & Requests
subTitle: See what's upcoming on GRVT and shape what's next

data.title: Performance page
data.description: Gain insights into your trading activities with a detailed view of trading performance and profit & loss (PNL).

data.title: Advanced Trading Tools
data.description: Access sophisticated tools such as target price, stop loss, TWAP (Time-Weighted Average Price), VWAP (Volume-Weighted Average Price), and trailing stop for precise trade management.

data.title: Expand Cross-chain Deposits
data.description: Support for multi-chain deposits, expanding compatibility with cross-chain providers like Squid.

data.title: Cross-Chain Withdrawals
data.description: Easily withdraw funds across multiple supported blockchain networks.

data.title: Unified Margin System
data.description: Trade with multi-coin margining to maximize flexibility and optimize asset usage.

data.title: Partial Liquidation Mechanism
data.description: Protect positions with partial liquidation, reducing exposure before initiating full liquidation.

data.title: Onramp Integration
data.description: Effortlessly convert fiat to crypto with integrated onramp providers such as Alchemy and Banxa.

data.title: Isolated Margin Accounts
data.description: Manage risk on a per-product basis with isolated margin, protecting specific positions independently.

data.title: Email Update Options
data.description: Easily change or update the email address associated with your account for seamless access.

data.title: In-App Push Notifications
data.description: Stay updated with real-time notifications directly within the app.

data.title: Estimated Liquidation Price Visualization
data.description: Track and visualize the estimated liquidation price for each open position.
